```{python}
def distance(fuel):
    print(fuel)
    if fuel == 1:
        return 1
    reserveFuel = fuel//2
    furtherDistance = (fuel-reserveFuel)//2
    return furtherDistance + distance(reserveFuel)
```

```{python}
distance(fuelTankSize)
```

```{python}
def other_distance(fuel):
    print(fuel)
    if fuel <= 1:
        return 1
    reservedFuel = fuel//5
    return 2*reservedFuel+other_distance(3*reservedFuel)
```

```{python}
other_distance(fuelTankSize)
```
